title: What the???
review: The movie was pretty well-produced, fairly entertaining, the acting pretty good, but, seriously...that Roy didn't just excuse himself and drive away when Amelia was acting so weird before dinner? Come on...I suspend my disbelief when watching the occasional Science Fiction or Fantasy, but.... really?? And what was up with his toupee-hair?

title: Really?
review:
Who on Earth could give this Movie a 10/10???

Bad acting, boring execution but a good Storyline.

The most awful thing about this Movie, is the Music. Really Horrible.

Sorry, but this flick is not good at all.

title: Oh my god
review: Very bad also the acting camera lightning sound and producing
